overview.en: DoDreamChain (DRM) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. DoDreamChain has a current supply of 250,000,000 with 0 in circulation. The last known price of DoDreamChain is 0.04658142 USD and is up 0.65 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 1 active market(s) with $40,448.98 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at http://ir.dodream.io/.
